attributes.additional_details:
Hill's amusements, the people who run the fair have been given notice to quit by the council, the fair has been running
for a great many years, and has become a much loved part of the local community, through the last couple of years it has not made any profit, but hills choose to come to settle for the love of its people and to provide much needed entertainment to the children and adults alike of the town, also a resident of 36 years of settle has worked on that ride since he was 12 years old and still works and is a close friend of the hill family, and many others have worked on the fair over the years, please join this page if you would like to keep the fair open, as we would, thanks for your support!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
